cafe

Class CoffeeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cafe.CoffeeController

  • public class CoffeeController
extends java.lang.Object
    The CoffeeController class takes care of the CoffeView.fxml. The CoffeView allows the user to choose their size of coffee, addIns, remove the addIns as well as adding their items to the order.
    Author:
    Prachiti Atigre, Ujani Patel

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoffeeController

        public CoffeeController()

    • Method Detail

      • addCoffeeOrder

        void addCoffeeOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method loads the OrderView.fxml so that information from the CoffeView can be passed onto the OrderView. It passes the information of addIns, cofeeSize, cofeeQuantity and the coffee that is to be ordered into the OrderView.
        Parameters:
        event, - upon the event of selecting the add to order button to add the coffee order.

      • caramelAddIn

        void caramelAddIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method adds or removes the selected checkBox of the Caramel addIn. If the check is present in the checkBox, Caramel is called by the "processAdd" method. If the check is unselected in the checkBox, Caramel is called but the "processRemove" method.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the caramel checkBox

      • creamAddIn

        void creamAddIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method adds or removes the selected checkBox of the cream addIn. If the check is present in the checkBox, cream is called by the "processAdd" method. If the check is unselected in the checkBox, cream is called but the "processRemove" method.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the cream checkBox

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method creates an observableList of type String to store the coffeeSize and of type integer to store the Quantity of the coffee from the comboBox so that the user can pick their size and quantity of coffee

      • milkAddIn

        void milkAddIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method adds or removes the selected checkBox of the milk addIn. If the check is present in the checkBox, milk is called by the "processAdd" method. If the check is unselected in the checkBox, milk is called but the "processRemove" method.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the milk checkBox

      • processAdd

        public void processAdd(java.lang.String name)
        This method checks if the selected checkBox is true and then calls the calculateItemPrice the price is displayed dynamically on the textArea.
        Parameters:
        name - upon selecting the addIn checkBox.

      • processQuantity

        public void processQuantity(int num)
        This method processes the quantity of the coffee that the user selected and it's cost. The price is displayed dynamically on the textArea.
        Parameters:
        num - upon selecting the quantity of the coffee

      • processRemove

        public void processRemove(java.lang.String name)
        This method checks if the unselected checkBox is true and then calls the calculateItemPrice the price is displayed dynamically on the textArea.
        Parameters:
        name - upon selecting the addIn checkBox.

      • processSize

        public void processSize(java.lang.String name)
        This method processes the size of the coffee that the user selected and it's cost. The price is displayed dynamically on the textArea.
        Parameters:
        name - upon selecting the size of the coffee

      • setQuantity

        void setQuantity(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method sets the quantity of the coffee the user chooses.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the quantity of coffee from the quantity comboBox

      • setSize

        void setSize(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method sets the size of the coffee the user chooses.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the size from the size comboBox

      • syrupAddIn

        void syrupAddIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method adds or removes the selected checkBox of syrup addIn. If the check is present in the checkBox, syrup is called by the "processAdd" method. If the check is unselected in the checkBox, syrup is called but the "processRemove" method.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the syrup checkBox

      • whippedCreamAddIn

        void whippedCreamAddIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method adds or removes the selected checkBox of the whippedCream addIn. If the check is present in the checkBox, whippedCream is called by the "processAdd" method. If the check is unselected in the checkBox, whippedCream is called but the "processRemove" method.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the whippedCream checkBox
